laboratory_examinations.findings: H:M ratio was 2.1 and washout rate was 21% before treatment; H:M ratio increased to 3.0 and washout rate decreased to 15% during treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased H:M ratio and decreased washout rate during treatment compared to before treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Nonreversible myocardial perfusion defects in the anterior, inferoposterior, and apical walls; unchanged after treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Defects were unchanged before and after treatment.
